frontmatter.title: Magpie
frontmatter.description: Desktop game where the player is a Magpie bird stealing from a museum guarded by dogs. This game was the final group project for Computer Game Programming Fall 2018 at Carnegie Mellon University.

frontmatter.title: Infiniforge
frontmatter.description: 3D Sword Mesh procedural generator written in TypeScript.

frontmatter.title: Raid AI
frontmatter.description: This was a brief startup project created on the side while working. The goal was to train agents using reinforcement learning to be better companions for RPG-style raid battles.

frontmatter.title: ML-Agent Boxing
frontmatter.description: I threw this project together over the course of a week as an entry in Unity's first challenge for their new 'Ml-Agents' machine learning workflow.
